item.description:
Comfort Food turned out to be really good yummy food! I will be sending the recipes to everyone who attended, so if you haven't given me your recipe and you were at the January meetup send it to me right away.
This month, February, the theme is romance. What is romantic food? Whatever it is, it is sure to be very special and very tasty. Join us with your favorite romantic recipe ready to cook and have fun.
Location address in West Hartford will be shared after RSVP.
All adult folk are welcome. This a monthly event with a good mix of ages and personalities. Come join us!
item.how_to_find_us: It will be at my flat. I will email all the yes responces with the address.
item.why: This will be fun because food always brings folks together. I've done cooking clubs before and they are always so much fun! We might play a board game after eatting or not...anything is possible.
item.name: The Hartford Cooking And Recipes February Meetup
